                     double z10,
                     double z01,
                     double z11,
                     double x,
                     double y)
        A method that calculate the value of f(x, y) by bilinear interpolation
        Parameters:
        z00, - the value of f(0, 0)
        z10, - the value of f(1, 0)
        z01, - the value of f(0, 1)
        z11, - the value of f(1, 1)
        x, - variable
        y, - variable
        Returns:
        f(x, y)

      • firstIntervalContainingRoot

        static double firstIntervalContainingRoot(java.util.function.DoubleUnaryOperator f,
                                          double minX,
                                          double maxX,
                                          double dX)
        Parameters:
        f, - the function to be used in this operation
        minX, - the lower bound
        maxX, - the upper bound
        dX, - the distance used in each step of calculation
        Returns:
        the lower bound once the distance between the two bounds is reduced to less than dx, and Positive infinity if there no root is found

      • isSameSign

        static boolean isSameSign(double x1,
                          double x2)
        Checks if two double have the same sign
        Parameters:
        x1, - variable 1
        x2, - variable 2
        Returns:
        true if x1 and x2 have the same sign, false otherwise

      • improveRoot

        static double improveRoot(java.util.function.DoubleUnaryOperator f,
                          double x1,
                          double x2,
                          double epsilon)
        Parameters:
        f - the function to be used in this operation
        x1 - One of the two bounds
        x2 - One of the two bounds
        epsilon, - maximal distance desired between the two bounds
        Returns:
        the lower bound once the distance between the two bounds is reduced to less than epsilon
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if f(x1) and f(x2) don't have the same sign
